title: House For Sale in 5th Lane, Colombo 3
details:
House for Sale in 5th Lane in Colombo 3
Located in 5th lane from land side from duplication road
House is old and to be renovated or can use the land to build a new house
Private lane from 5th lane and only few meters away from the main 5th lane
Highly residential area and ideal location to built a house
Rare opportunity to buy a property in the area with a value appreciation
9.3 Perches of rectangular land to build a good house
